scripts.generate: VERSION=$(cat ./../../../VERSION) npx --yes @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli@latest generate -i ./../../../openapi.json -g typescript-fetch -o ./ --additional-properties="supportsES6=true,npmName=@trysoma/api-client,npmVersion=${VERSION},prefixParameterInterfaces=true" && pnpm run lint:fix
scripts.build: pnpm run generate && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json
